short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Markdown when writing on MetaFilter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Markdown is a simpler way to format text. It's easier to read and write than HTML â€” so you can focus on your words, not on your formatting.

Markdown for MeFi lets you use Markdown when writing comments and posts on MetaFilter.com.

This is not a product of metafilter.com.
